DataElement.preferredName: Quality of Life And Arm and Breast Questionnaire Completion Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication whether or not the patient meets the eligibility criteria for participation in a clinical trial with regards to the completion of the QOL and Arm and Breast questionnaires.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Quality of Life And Arm and Breast Questionnaire Complete
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._A questionnaire developed by the Canadian Cancer Trials Group, Queens University, using questions from other validated questionnaires, for use in-house._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Quality of Life And Arm and Breast Questionnaire
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.:An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.:A questionnaire developed by the Canadian Cancer Trials Group, Queens University, using questions from other validated questionnaires, for use in-house.

Concepts.definition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
A questionnaire developed by the Canadian Cancer Trials Group, Queens University, using questions from other validated questionnaires, for use in-house.

Property.preferredDefinition: Complete; having every necessary or normal part or component or step; or having come or been brought to a conclusion.

Concepts.definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Immunity from an obligation or duty.

Concepts.definition: Immunity from an obligation or duty.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 11-21-18 TT released/CWinch. 12/1/17 added PV, edit to LN. 10/17/17 tt CE7

ReferenceDocuments.name: If the patient has agreed to
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient has agreed to particiate in optional questionnaire completion, the patient has completed the baseline quality of life questionnaires (EORTC QLQ-C30 +QLQ-BR23 and Arm and Breast Symptom Questionnaire), health utilities questionnaire (EQ-5D) and lost productivity questionnaire within 14 days prior to randomization and is willing to complete future assessments.
